0.Title: Welcome CAPE Video
0.Description: Welcome video from our founder Elisa Carrillo!

1.Title: Git
1.Description: This lesson is all about Git! Learn about git, download git, and prepare git to be used with VSCode and GitHub! Click to learn more!

2.Title: GitHub
2.Description: What is GitHub? In this video you will make your own GitHub account and your first own repository! At the end resources will be shared to get you started.

3.Title: VSCode
3.Description: What is VSCode? Here you will download VSCode, learn how to navigate folders and files, and Basic Commands via the Command Line.

0.Title: HTML & CSS
0.Description: Introduction to Front-End development! What is HTML & CSS? What is Javascript? Find out how these languages all work together to form a website!

1.Title: DEMO
1.Description: Start creating your first ever website! In this tutorial you will learn how to build your website with HTML & CSS. Afterwards, you will create your own page and submit to GitHub.

0.Title: Introduction to JavaScript
0.Description: Introduction to Javascript! What is JavaScript? Why it is important for web development?

1.Title: JavaScript Syntax
1.Description: Begin learning to program in JavaScript. In this video, learn about commmon JavaScript syntax, variables, and data types!

2.Title: Control Structures
2.Description: Continue learning about JavaScript and control structures and loops! This video introduces if...else and switch case statements as well as while and for loops!

3.Title: Error Handling
3.Description: Errors are going to happen! In this video, learn about try...catch statements for expected errors!

4.Title: DOM Manipulation
4.Description: Learn to create an interactive and responsive webpage. In this video, learn to use DOM methods and get a brief introduction to event handlers!

5.Title: Event Handlers
5.Description: Continue to make an interactive webpage. This videos works with creating buttons that change components made in HTML and CSS!
